name: Last Numbers
description:
Confident of your ability in remembering colors and numbers? Tell me about that after taking challenges in Last Numbers.

HOW TO PLAY:
Last Numbers is quite EASY and HARD to play at the same time.
You will get some circles with different numbers and colors each round. Do your best putting them in your brain and then tap them out.
Let's see how far can you go.

Features:
- Easy, funny, and excruciating
- Flat style
- iCould sync
- Share to show off your strong memory
